title: Endometriosis Symptom Survey
description: Please answer the following questions based on your recent experiences. Each 'Yes' will be interpreted as the presence of the symptom.

questions.text: Do you experience heavy menstrual bleeding?
Do you suffer from painful menstruation (dysmenorrhea)?
Do you feel pain during sexual intercourse?
Do you frequently experience pelvic pain?
Are your periods irregular or sometimes missed?
Do you often experience abdominal cramping?
Do you have abdominal pain or pressure?
Do you have persistent or recurring back pain?
Do you feel pain during bowel movements?
Do you often feel nauseous?
Do you notice blood clots during menstruation?
Have you faced difficulty conceiving (infertility)?
Do you experience general chronic pain?
Do you experience chronic diarrhea?
Do your menstrual periods last unusually long (more than 7 days)?
Do you experience chronic constipation?
Do you experience frequent vomiting?
Do you feel constantly fatigued or tired?
Do you experience pain during ovulation?
Do you get stomach cramping unrelated to menstruation?
Do you suffer from migraines?
Do you have leg pain, particularly during menstruation?
Have you ever fainted or felt like passing out due to pain or fatigue?
Do you frequently experience mood swings?
Have you experienced depression or low mood?
Do you have any fertility-related concerns or diagnoses?
Have you been diagnosed with ovarian cysts?
Do you experience pain or burning when urinating?
Do you often experience headaches?
Do you experience pain after sexual intercourse?
Do you often have digestive problems (bloating, pain, etc.)?
Do you experience IBS-like symptoms (alternating constipation/diarrhea)?
Have you been diagnosed with anaemia or iron deficiency?
Do you experience hip or lower pelvic pain?
Do you feel vaginal pain or pressure?
Do you ever feel sharp or stabbing abdominal pain?
Do you suffer from anxiety or panic episodes?
Do you frequently feel dizzy or lightheaded?
Do you occasionally experience low-grade fever?
Have you been told you have hormonal problems or imbalances?
Do you often experience bloating?
Do you frequently feel sick or unwell?
Do you feel low energy or exhaustion?
Do you experience abdominal cramps during sex?
Do you have insomnia or trouble sleeping?
Do you suffer from acne or pimples?
Have you noticed a loss of appetite recently?
